sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.MIDClusterManagementUtil</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Script include contains the condition used by the Business Rule "MID Server Cluster Management"</description> <name>MIDClusterManagementUtil</name> <script><![CDATA[MIDClusterManagementUtil = { checkPrecondition: function(current) { var filteredTopics = ['HeartbeatProbe', 'SystemCommand', 'Command', 'MonitoringProbe', 'config.file']; return current.agent.startsWith('mid.server.') && current.queue == 'output' && !current.topic.startsWith('queue.') && !current.topic.startsWith('MIDExtension:') && filteredTopics.indexOf(current.topic + '') == -1; }, };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>christopher.thompson</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-05-04 11:13:45</sys_created_on> <sys_id>359da96bb3b32010a7606330c6a8dc36</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>MIDClusterManagementUtil</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="MID Server" source="com.glideapp.agent">881201476d6620100acb70b3534330fa</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_359da96bb3b32010a7606330c6a8dc36</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>christopher.thompson</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-05-04 11:13:45</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>397</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
